label: SENT
text:
You need to leave, because
   even if they do something for DREAMers, it will take a lot of time to
   implement that law, and you would lose maybe one or two years of college --
   you can come back and visit us," and I said, "Well, you're right."
 
 
   I applied to Mexican universities, but they told me I would have to restart
   my high school and that my ACT and my SAT weren't accepted.
name: Melani
